payment_terms.text:
Payment Terms. When fees are not collected directly from the corporate user, MA
agrees to pay Company, in the manner and at the time specified below, the fee(s) on
Company’s current price list in effect at the time an order is received by Company as
set forth in Schedule A.

7.2

Currency. All monies due Company shall be remitted in United States dollars. Amounts
due to Company are to be calculated based upon the information contained in Schedule
A of this agreement.

7.3

Required Documents. MA shall make payment for all Technology according to the
terms in Schedule A of this Agreement, and p

2.

Grant of Rights.

2.1

General Rights. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Company hereby
grants to MA the right to advertise, market and sell to corporate users, government
agencies and educational facilities (“Clients”) for their own internal language learning, soft
